message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $18,000 is way too high for me. This product would be valuable to me, but I need to stay within a reasonable budget. Would you consider $11,000?

Bob, I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11,000. I can meet you in the middle at $14,000, which is still a great deal for you considering the product's value to you. I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me a bit closer to my budget, but $14,000 is still pushing it for me. I'm willing to offer $12,000.  That's a fair price, and I'm hoping we can make a deal.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $12,000. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $13,500? This is a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to your business.
Alice, this is getting close to what I can afford, but I need to be mindful of my budget. I can offer $12,500, and I think that's a fair compromise.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you a price of $13,000, which is still a good deal for you, considering the product's value. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Alice, your price is getting closer to what I had in mind.  I'm willing to go up to $12,750. I believe that's a very fair offer, and I'm hoping we can finalize this deal.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $12,750, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $13,250? This is a fair price, considering the value the product will bring to your business.
